name: Buon Appetito
description:
School Project: ISART DIGITAL, the Video Game and 3D Animation / VFX School

COOKING MAMA MEETS A TURN-BASED CARDS FIGHTING GAME: BUON APPETITO

Incarn Edzia and learn the dangerous way of cooking in Venice. Use your cooking arsenal for cooking fish to perfection and be the best chef in town.

A Gamepad is needed to play the game

Credit

Programmer: Lux Rain Diaz / Auxana Gollnick / Aymerick Hebert / Loïc Jacob / Nathan Pflier

Game Designer : Léo Brover / Natacha Léonard / Jonathan Bergoz / Maxence Quenedey / Paul Richarte / Corentin Samaniego

Game Artist : Héléna Beilloin / Romain Campargue / Zoë Chaplain / Silja Hury / Victor Lopez / Jade Maillard / Lucille Moreau
